mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_PHONE, USER_JOB, USER_PURPOSE, JOINED_AT, RISK_TYPE, TERMS_AGREE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userPhone}, #{userJob}, #{userPurpose}, #{joinedAt}, #{riskType}, #{termsAgree} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_PW AS userPw, USER_PHONE AS userPhone, USER_JOB AS userJob, USER_PURPOSE AS userPurpose, JOINED_AT AS joinedAt, RISK_TYPE AS riskType, TERMS_AGREE AS termsAgree FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
SELECT USER_ID FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
